task_template_description_set_table: Tira fuori i piatti, le posate, i bicchieri e mettili in ordine
task_template_description_trash: Metti fuori i sacchetti della spazzatura e buttali via
task_template_description_candy: Non ha mangiato nessuna caramella per tutta la settimana

task_template_title_table_manners: Impara le buone manière a tavola
task_template_description_table_manners: Siediti composto, usa il coltello e la forchetta e non giocare con il mangiare
task_template_description_gather_for_don: Raccogli oggetti che si possono dare via
task_template_title_loppis: Crea il tuo proprio mercato delle pulci

task_template_description_selling_stand: Vendi degli oggetti agli altri per strada

task_template_description_gym_bag: Prepara la tua borsa per lo sport prima di assistere alle lezioni di sport
task_template_description_skipped_class: Non sei andato a scuola anche se dovevi andarci
task_template_description_phone_at_dinne: Non si devono usare i telefoni a tavola
task_template_description_surf: Resta nel giro del tuo barattolo di navigazione
task_template_description_not_cleaned: Nel casa in cui la camera non è messa a posto una volta alla settimana
task_template_description_fight: Se litighi con i tuoi fratelli o sorelle, a scuola o pure con i tuoi genitori
task_template_description_wash_car: PLZ_TRANSLATE Wash the car's outside and clean the inside
task_template_description_late_sleep: PLZ_TRANSLATE If you went to sleep later than agreed

task_template_description_immigrants: PLZ_TRANSLATE Gather things that we can donate

task_template_description_help_pet: PLZ_TRANSLATE Take a walk of at least ten minutes

task_template_description_get_mail: PLZ_TRANSLATE Bring the mail, and put it on the table

task_template_description_tuck_siblings: PLZ_TRANSLATE Embed the younger siblings in bed
task_template_description_shovel_snow: PLZ_TRANSLATE Shovel the driveway and around the car

task_template_description_clean_play: PLZ_TRANSLATE Pick up the toys and put everything in order
task_template_description_get_night_sibl: PLZ_TRANSLATE Put a younger siblings to bed
task_template_description_snowman: PLZ_TRANSLATE Do not forget the carrot nose!
task_template_description_snowman_mounta: PLZ_TRANSLATE Make a snowman with eyes and nose. Take a picure of you standing next to it.
task_template_title_wood_mountain_specia: PLZ_TRANSLATE Build a tower of logs
task_template_description_wood_mountain_: PLZ_TRANSLATE Build a tower of logs, as high as possible. Take a picture of the tower.
task_template_description_angel_mountain: PLZ_TRANSLATE Add in the snow and make a snow angel by moving your arms and legs. Then take a picture of the angel.
task_template_title_junk_mountain_specia: PLZ_TRANSLATE Pick up trash and throw away
task_template_description_junk_mountain_: PLZ_TRANSLATE Find trash and throw it in the nearest trash can, take a picture when you throw it.
task_template_description_dish_mountain_: PLZ_TRANSLATE Guida in linea e fare i piatti dopo cena e scattare una foto.
task_template_description_decoration_eas: PLZ_TRANSLATE Contribuire alla creazione di decorazioni pasquali

task_template_description_leaves_easter_: PLZ_TRANSLATE Dare una mano con rastrellare le foglie.
task_template_title_breakfast_surprise: PLZ_TRANSLATE Sorpresa con la prima colazione
task_template_description_breakfast_surp: PLZ_TRANSLATE Sorprendi i tuoi genitori con una deliziosa colazione week-end!
task_template_description_treehouse: PLZ_TRANSLATE Costruire una casa sull'albero di fuori con gli amici o fratelli.
task_template_title_handstand: PLZ_TRANSLATE Non uno stand di mano 10 volte
task_template_description_handstand: PLZ_TRANSLATE Fare uno stand mano libera o contro un muro. Chiedi un adulto per un aiuto.
task_template_description_hide_and_seek_: PLZ_TRANSLATE Raccogliere un gruppo di amici e giocare a nascondino!
goal_group_description_general: PLZ_TRANSLATE Do you want a new computer or an airboard to cruise around the city? Here is a list showing what other kids want the most right now! The percentage depicts how popular the products have been 2017.
goal_group_description_trending: PLZ_TRANSLATE What is the coolest thing to have right now? Here you have the list of the hottest gadgets among children for the moment. The percentage depicts how much the products have grown during 2017.
goal_group_description_tips: PLZ_TRANSLATE The Micro Managers is a group that helps make our app better. Here are their own favourite gifts for Christmas.
goal_group_description_game: PLZ_TRANSLATE Do you also like to play the latest computer and video games? Here is the list showing the most popular games among children right now!
goal_group_description_year_5: PLZ_TRANSLATE Hoho! Here you can see what most 5-8 year olds hope to find under the Christmas tree.
goal_group_description_year_9: PLZ_TRANSLATE Do you wish you a new smartphone or perhaps a pair of nice headphones to listen to music? Here is a list that shows what 9-12 year olds would most like to have right now.
goal_group_description_year_13: Vorresti dei bei vestiti, un nuovo computer o una fotocamera per natale ? Dai un’occhiata qui sotto agli articoli più desiderati fra i ragazzi di 13-16 anni.
